CWP.dataset

The goal of CWP.dataset is to â€¦

Installation

You can install the development version of CWP.dataset from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("bastienird/CWP.dataset")

Documentation

Full documentation website on: https://bastienird.github.io/CWP.dataset

Example 

fusen::draw_package_structure()
